articles.author: Joshua Oliver
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried's lawyer rebuts claims of frivolous FTX spending - Financial Times
articles.description: Value of crypto exchange’s deals broached during cross-examination of co-operating witness Nishad Singh in fraud trial
articles.content:
Sam Bankman-Frieds spending at the collapsed FTX cryptocurrency exchange was not frivolous, his defence lawyer argued in a courtroom cross-examination of former executive Nishad Singh.
